system.effect: The blast of energy sears the flesh and bone of the target's leg, leaving a nasty burn scar. The target cannot use the Run or Charge actions for 2 rounds.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Leg (Severity 1)

The blast of energy sears the flesh and bone of the target's leg, leaving a nasty burn scar. The target cannot use the Run or Charge actions for 2 rounds.
